8.LIBERAL: We ought to provide condoms for high school students, because
they are going to have sex anyway.
CONSERVATIVE: That’s just like arguing that we should provide high school
students with guns, because they are going to use guns anyway.
9.SCIENTIST: My initial steps toward human cloning, no matter how contro-
versial, are important because they bring the debate out into the public.
OPPONENT: That’s
